title: The Last Straw
description: When a teenage girl witnesses a carjacking gone bad, she is marked for death by a crime boss with no apparent motive. A black lawyer and a white enforcer with an unlikely history forge an uneasy alliance to protect the girl from a hit man with an agenda of his own.  After they find out that the crime boss is the father of the black teenage carjacker, Paul Elliott - lawyer and close friend of the witnessâ€™s family - begins counseling them.  As the long-simmering feud between Rico and John D'Angelo reaches boiling point, bodies start to pile up in rapid succession... and old scores will be settled.
author: Ed Duncan
